---

description: mRuby fluorescent protein codon-optimized for S. cerevisiae
prefix: A
suffix: GGATCC
sequence: 
---

Red fluorescent protein derived from DsRed with codon optimization for expression in S. cerevisiae. Exhibits bright red fluorescence with excitation/emission maxima at 558/605 nm.
